alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:05PM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, George and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, water covers the main road at Plum Bluff in southern George County. At 22.0 feet, flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to a crest of 22.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
